meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride was thrilling for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The thrilling movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent3: It was thrilling to see the puppy chase its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The thrilling thunderstorm painted the sky with flashes of light.
meanings.sent5: The thrilling adventure left a lasting impression on the young explorers.

meanings.definition: Arousing a strong feeling of excitement or emotion
meanings.sent1: The thrilling news of the surprise party spread quickly.
meanings.sent2: The thrilling music at the concert made everyone dance.
meanings.sent3: It was thrilling to watch the squirrel try to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The thrilling sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The thrilling performance brought tears of joy to the audience.
